Sentencas: Materials formulated as La2Ni1-xCuxO4+delta (0 <= x <= 1) have been synthesised to be evaluated as possible cathode materials in SOFCs.
Titulo: Evaluation of the La2Ni1-xCUxO4+δ system as SOFC cathode material with 8YSZ and LSGM as electrolytes

Sentencas: Their crystal structures have been investigated by high-resolution neutron powder diffraction at RT so as to map out the phase diagram.
Titulo: Evaluation of the La2Ni1-xCUxO4+δ system as SOFC cathode material with 8YSZ and LSGM as electrolytes

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficients have been determined to be in the range of 10.8-13.0 x 10(-6) K-1.
Titulo: Evaluation of the La2Ni1-xCUxO4+δ system as SOFC cathode material with 8YSZ and LSGM as electrolytes

Sentencas: Total conductivity values are as good as 87 S cm(-1) at 580 degrees C for x= 0.4.
Titulo: Evaluation of the La2Ni1-xCUxO4+δ system as SOFC cathode material with 8YSZ and LSGM as electrolytes

Sentencas: In order to assess the performance of each oxide as cathode material, ac impedance measurements were carried out on La2Ni1-xCuxO4+delta/electrolyte/La2N1-xCuxO4+delta symmetrical cells with either LSGM or 8YSZ as electrolyte material.
Titulo: Evaluation of the La2Ni1-xCUxO4+δ system as SOFC cathode material with 8YSZ and LSGM as electrolytes

Sentencas: For all the electrode compositions studied, the best specific resistance (ASR) values were obtained with LSGM as electrolyte.
Titulo: Evaluation of the La2Ni1-xCUxO4+δ system as SOFC cathode material with 8YSZ and LSGM as electrolytes

Sentencas: The better performance of x=0.4 and 0.6 (ASR similar to 1 Omega cm(2) at 850 degrees C) compositions has been associated with the magnitude of the total conductivity and the matching of the TEC values of the cathodes with those of the electrolytes.
Titulo: Evaluation of the La2Ni1-xCUxO4+δ system as SOFC cathode material with 8YSZ and LSGM as electrolytes
